name: Straight Up: Sister-zoned!
description:
Since as long as she can remember, Shuna has borne an unrelenting crush on her childhood friend who lives across the street from her. There's only this one LITTLE problem: He sees her as a little sister... nothing more, nothing less...

Then again, she was turning 18 soon, so things were bound to change.

But her parents plan to announce her engagement on the very same day!!!

Play as Shuna, as she decides to actively pursue this fake older brother of hers.
Will she steal his heart away? Or will she stay the 'little sister' character and concede to fate?
You decide!~

Help us get on STEAM!!! ---->

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=898020420

Features:

  • 21,473 words in total.
  • 2 CGs
  • 3 Endings.
  • 4 Achievements.
  • Cheesy Romance.
  • Silhouettes with heavier roles than intended.
  • Very Blue GUI.

Credits

  • Sprite Colors and CGs: wingzofdarkness
  • Co-writer/Beta : Godline
  • Resources
  • Backgrounds: mao, masato,
  • Silhouettes & Images: konnett.
  • Music: Tam's Music Factory, Kavin Macleod.
  • Sfx: Soundbible.
  • Calendar UI: Zestubou
  • Made With: Ren'Py
  • Everything else: Sayumi101

A/N: This Nano was filled with UPs and DOWNs. The only reason this was even possible was because of wingz's amazingly on-point work with the art, Godline's lightning fast beta-ing and the latter's enthusiasm for project no-face... XD

Hope you Enjoy!

If you like my content, consider buying me a coffee >.<  I know it's more of a figure of speech,  but caffeine helps. ^^ https://ko-fi.com/sayumi
